item.title: Africa to be hit hard as UK foreign aid cuts revealed
item.description: A Foreign Office report shows the biggest cuts will come in Africa with less spent on women's health and water sanitation.

item.title: Faisal Islam: Trump's tough tariff tactics are getting results
item.description: Following the deal with Japan, it could now be said that the aggressive approach to trade by Trump is yielding results.

item.title: Apology for S Korean woman convicted of biting man's tongue as he attacked her
item.description: Choi Mal-ja, now 78, has campaigned for years to overturn her sentence, after she was attacked when she was 18.

item.title: Erik Menendez taken to hospital with 'serious' condition, lawyer tells US media
item.description: It comes weeks before he and his brother are expected at a parole hearing, after decades in US prison.

item.title: What the US-Japan deal means for Asia and the world
item.description: An agreement gives firms certainty after months of chaos from Donald Trump's tariff policy.
